mapper.select: select ID id, ACCOUNT account, TENANT_ID tenantId, MEMBER_NAME memberName, PASSWORD password, TENANT_NAME tenantName, ADDRESS address, ADDRESS_ID addressId, GENDER gender, POSITION position, MAIL_ADDRESS mailAddress, QQ qq, WECHAT wechat, JOB_NUMBER jobNumber, PORTRAIT portrait, TELEPHONE telephone, FAX fax, DEL_FLAG delFlag, CREATE_TIME createTime, UPDATE_TIME updateTime, IS_ADMIN isAdmin,LOGIN_FROM loginFrom From USERS Where ID = #{id} AND DEL_FLAG = 0
